title: Subcomplex vector spaces
content: Usually, "complex vector spaces" are vector spaces over the field of the complex numbers, see for example the definition in [Roman] p. 36. In the setting of set.mm, it is convenient to consider collectively vector spaces on subfields of the field of complex numbers. We call these, "subcomplex vector spaces" and collect them in the class ` CVec ` defined in ~ df-cvs and characterized in ~ iscvs . These include rational vector spaces ( ~ qcvs ), real vector spaces ( ~ recvs ) and complex vector spaces ( ~ cncvs ). This definition is analogous to the definition of subcomplex modules (and their class ` CMod `), which are modules over subrings of the field of complex numbers. Note that ZZ-modules (that are roughly the same thing as Abelian groups, see ~ zlmclm ) are subcomplex modules but are not subcomplex vector spaces (see ~ zclmncvs ), because the ring ZZ is not a division ring (see ~ zringndrg ). Since the field of complex numbers is commutative, so are its subrings, so there is no need to explicitly state "left module" or "left vector space" for subcomplex modules or vector spaces.

df-cvs
blocks.content: Define the class of subcomplex vector spaces, which are the subcomplex modules which are also vector spaces. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-May-2019.)

blocks.name: cvslvec
blocks.content: A subcomplex vector space is a (left) vector space. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-May-2019.)

blocks.name: cvsclm
blocks.content: A subcomplex vector space is a subcomplex module. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-May-2019.)

blocks.name: iscvs
blocks.content: A subcomplex vector space is a subcomplex module over a division ring. For example, the subcomplex modules over the rational or real or complex numbers are subcomplex vector spaces. (Contributed by AV, 4-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: iscvsp
blocks.content: The predicate "is a subcomplex vector space." (Contributed by NM, 31-May-2008.) (Revised by AV, 4-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: cvsunit
blocks.content: Unit group of the scalar ring of a subcomplex vector space. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm cvsunit(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ccvs), wceq(cdif(c1, csn(nat0)), cfv(cui, c2)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
} = {
  eqtr4d(cdif(c1, csn(nat0)), cfv(cui, c2), cdif(c1, csn(cfv(c0g, c2))), wcel(c0, ccvs))
  difeq2d(c1, csn(nat0), csn(cfv(c0g, c2)), wcel(c0, ccvs))
  sneqd(nat0, cfv(c0g, c2), wcel(c0, ccvs))
  syl(wcel(c0, ccvs), wceq(nat0, cfv(c0g, c2)), wcel(c0, cclm))
  cvsclm(c0, wcel(c0, ccvs))
  clm0(c0, c2)
  3syl(wcel(c0, ccvs), wceq(cfv(cui, c2), cdif(c1, csn(cfv(c0g, c2)))), wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c2, cdr))
  cvslvec(c0, wcel(c0, ccvs))
  id(wcel(c0, ccvs))
  lvecdrng(c0, c2)
  simprbi(wcel(c2, cdr), wceq(cfv(cui, c2), cdif(c1, csn(cfv(c0g, c2)))), wcel(c2, crg))
  isdrng(c2, cfv(cui, c2), c1, cfv(c0g, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cui, c2))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c2))
}

  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CVec →(c1 \ { 0 })=(Unit ` c2))

} = {

  cvsclm(c0, c0 ∈ CVec)
  clm0(c0, c2)
  3syl(c0 ∈ CVec, (Unit ` c2)=(c1 \ {(0 ` c2)}), c0 ∈ LVec, c2 ∈ DivRing)
  cvslvec(c0, c0 ∈ CVec)
  id(c0 ∈ CVec)
  lvecdrng(c0, c2)
  simprbi(c2 ∈ DivRing, (Unit ` c2)=(c1 \ {(0 ` c2)}), c2 ∈ Ring)
  isdrng(c2, (Unit ` c2), c1, (0 ` c2))
  eqid((Unit ` c2))
  eqid((0 ` c2))
}

thm cvsdiv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))), wceq(co(c1, cdiv, c3), co(c1, cfv(cdvr, c4), c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(csca, c0))

} = {
  eqtr4d(co(c1, cdiv, c3), co(c1, cfv(cdvr, c4), c3), co(c1, cfv(cdvr, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), c3), wa(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))), wceq(co(c1, cdiv, c3), co(c1, cfv(cdvr, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), c3)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cui, co(ccnfld, cress, c2))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))), wcel(c2, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(c0, cclm))
  clmsubrg(c0, c2, c4)
  simpr1(wcel(c0, ccvs), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))
  eleqtrd(c3, cfv(cui, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), cdif(c2, csn(nat0)), wa(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))))
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))), wcel(c3, cdif(c2, csn(nat0))), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, ccvs), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, ccvs), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))
  eldifsn(c3, c2, nat0)
  eqtrd(cdif(c2, csn(nat0)), cfv(cui, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), cfv(cui, c4), wa(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))), wceq(cdif(c2, csn(nat0)), cfv(cui, c4)), wcel(c0, ccvs))
  cvsunit(c0, c2, c4)
  fveq2d(cui, c4, co(ccnfld, cress, c2), wa(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))))
  subrgdv(c2, ccnfld, c1, c3, cfv(cui, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), cdiv, cfv(cdvr, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), co(ccnfld, cress, c2))
  eqid(co(ccnfld, cress, c2))
  cnflddiv()
  eqid(cfv(cui, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)))
  eqid(cfv(cdvr, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)))
  oveqd(c1, cfv(cdvr, c4), c3, cfv(cdvr, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))))
  fveq2d(cdvr, c4, co(ccnfld, cress, c2), wa(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))), wceq(c4, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)), wcel(c0, cclm))
  cvsclm(c0, wa(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))))
  simpl(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0)))
  clmsca(c0, c4, c2)
}

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ≠ 0))→(c1[÷]c3)=(c1[(/r ` c4)]c3))
  ⊣ c4 =(Scalar ` c0)

  syl3anc((c0 ∈ CVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ≠ 0)), (c1[÷]c3)=(c1[(/r `(CCfld[|`s]c2))]c3), c2 ∈(SubRing ` CCfld), c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈(Unit `(CCfld[|`s]c2)))

  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ CVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ≠ 0)), c3 ∈(c2 \ { 0 }), c3 ∈ c2, c3 ≠ 0)
  simpr2(c0 ∈ CVec, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c3 ≠ 0)
  simpr3(c0 ∈ CVec, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c3 ≠ 0)

  eqtrd((c2 \ { 0 }), (Unit `(CCfld[|`s]c2)), (Unit ` c4), (c0 ∈ CVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ≠ 0)))
  syl((c0 ∈ CVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ≠ 0)), (c2 \ { 0 })=(Unit ` c4), c0 ∈ CVec)
  cvsunit(c0, c2, c4)

  subrgdv(c2, ccnfld, c1, c3, (Unit `(CCfld[|`s]c2)), cdiv, (/r `(CCfld[|`s]c2)), (CCfld[|`s]c2))

  fveq2d(cdvr, c4, (CCfld[|`s]c2), (c0 ∈ CVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ≠ 0)))
  syl((c0 ∈ CVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ≠ 0)), c4 =(CCfld[|`s]c2), c0 ∈ CMod)
  cvsclm(c0, (c0 ∈ CVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ≠ 0)))
  simpl(c0 ∈ CVec, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ≠ 0))

blocks.name: cvsdivcl
blocks.content: The scalar field of a subcomplex vector space is closed under division. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-May-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm cvsdivcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c3), c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4))
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c1, cdiv, c3), c2, co(c1, cfv(cdvr, c4), c3), wa(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))))
  cvsdiv(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))), wcel(co(c1, cfv(cdvr, c4), c3), c2), wcel(c4, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, cfv(cui, c4)))
  3syl(wa(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))), wcel(c4, crg), wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c4, cdr))
  cvslvec(c0, wa(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))))
  simpl(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0)))
  lvecdrng(c0, c4)
  drngring(c4)
  simpr1(wcel(c0, ccvs), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))
  eleqtrd(c3, cfv(cui, c4), cdif(c2, csn(nat0)), wa(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))))
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))), wcel(c3, cdif(c2, csn(nat0))), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))
  simpr2(wcel(c0, ccvs), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))
  simpr3(wcel(c0, ccvs), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0))
  eldifsn(c3, c2, nat0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, ccvs), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wne(c3, nat0)), wceq(cdif(c2, csn(nat0)), cfv(cui, c4)))
  cvsunit(c0, c2, c4)
  dvrcl(c4, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cui, c4), cfv(cdvr, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cui, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cdvr, c4))
}

thm cvsdivcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ CVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ≠ 0))→(c1[÷]c3)∈ c2)

  3syl((c0 ∈ CVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ≠ 0)), c4 ∈ Ring, c0 ∈ LVec, c4 ∈ DivRing)

  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ CVec ∧(c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c2 ∧ c3 ≠ 0)), c3 ∈(c2 \ { 0 }), c3 ∈ c2, c3 ≠ 0)
  simpr2(c0 ∈ CVec, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c2, c3 ≠ 0)

thm cvsmuleqdivd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), c3, c4)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cvsca, c6))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(csca, c6))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cbs, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, ccvs))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c2, nat0))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c2, c3, c0), co(c1, c3, c4)))
} = {
  3eqtr3d(c0, co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), c3, c4), co(co(nat1, cdiv, c2), c3, co(c2, c3, c0)), co(co(nat1, cdiv, c2), c3, co(c1, c3, c4)), w0)
  oveq2d(co(nat1, cdiv, c2), c3, co(c2, c3, c0), co(c1, c3, c4), w0)
  3eqtr3d(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c2), c3, co(c2, c3, c0)), c0, co(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c2), cmul, c2), c3, c0), co(nat1, c3, c0), w0)
  oveq1d(co(co(nat1, cdiv, c2), cmul, c2), c3, c0, nat1, w0)

  3adant1(0 ∈ ℂ, hs0 ∈ ℂ, hs1 ∈ ℂ, (hs0[+]hs1)∈ ℂ)

  addass(hs0, hs1, hs2)

  eqtrd((-u(hs0)[+]hs0), nat0, (hs0[+]-u(hs0)), (0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs0 ∈ ℂ))
  adantl(0 ∈ ℂ, hs0 ∈ ℂ, (-u(hs0)[+]hs0)=(hs0[+]-u(hs0)))
  addcomd(-u(hs0), hs0, hs0 ∈ ℂ)
  negcl(hs0)
  id(hs0 ∈ ℂ)
  adantl(0 ∈ ℂ, hs0 ∈ ℂ, (hs0[+]-u(hs0))= 0)
  negid(hs0)
  islmodd(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, cc, caddc, ccnfld, cmul, cc, caddc, cmul, nat1, c0 ∈ Grp)

  a1i(c0 ∈ Grp, ℂ =(Base ` CCfld))
  cnfldbas()
  a1i(c0 ∈ Grp, + =(+ ` CCfld))
  cnfldadd()
  a1i(c0 ∈ Grp, × =(× ` CCfld))
  cnfldmul()
  a1i(c0 ∈ Grp, 1 =(1r ` CCfld))
  cnfld1()
  a1i(c0 ∈ Grp, CCfld ∈ Ring)
  cnring()
  id(c0 ∈ Grp)
  3adant1(c0 ∈ Grp, hs0 ∈ ℂ, hs1 ∈ ℂ, (hs0[×]hs1)∈ ℂ)
  mulcl(hs0, hs1)
  adantl(c0 ∈ Grp, (hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs2 ∈ ℂ), (hs0[×](hs1[+]hs2))=((hs0[×]hs1)[+](hs0[×]hs2)))
  adddi(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  adantl(c0 ∈ Grp, (hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs2 ∈ ℂ), ((hs0[+]hs1)[×]hs2)=((hs0[×]hs2)[+](hs1[×]hs2)))
  adddir(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  adantl(c0 ∈ Grp, (hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs2 ∈ ℂ), ((hs0[×]hs1)[×]hs2)=(hs0[×](hs1[×]hs2)))
  mulass(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  adantl(c0 ∈ Grp, hs0 ∈ ℂ, (1[×]hs0)= hs0)

  cnrlmod(c0)
  eqcomi(ccnfld, co(ccnfld, cress, cc))
  ax-mp(wceq(co(ccnfld, cress, cc), ccnfld), wcel(ccnfld, universe))
  ressid(ccnfld, universe, cc)
  cnfldbas()
  cnsubrglem(hs0, hs1, cc)
  id(wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
  addcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  negcl(cv(hs0))
  ax-1cn()
  mulcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  isclmi(c0, ccnfld, cc)
  eqtri(ccnfld, cfv(csca, c0), cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, ccnfld)))
  ax-mp(wceq(ccnfld, cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, ccnfld))), wcel(ccnfld, universe))
  cnfldex()
  rlmsca(ccnfld, universe)
  fveq2i(csca, cfv(crglmod, ccnfld), c0)
  eqcomi(cfv(crglmod, ccnfld), c0)

  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)

blocks.content: The field of the real numbers as left module over itself is a subcomplex vector space. The vector operation is ` + ` , and the scalar product is ` x. ` . (Contributed by AV, 22-Oct-2021.)

thm recvs(class c0) {
  |- wcel(c0, ccvs)
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(crglmod, crefld))
} = {
  3eltr4i(c0, ccvs, cfv(crglmod, crefld), cin(cclm, clvec))
  elini(cfv(crglmod, crefld), cclm, clvec)
  mp3an(wcel(cfv(crglmod, crefld), cclm), wcel(cfv(crglmod, crefld), clmod), wceq(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, crefld)), co(ccnfld, cress, cr)), wcel(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  ax-mp(wcel(cfv(crglmod, crefld), clmod), wcel(crefld, crg))
  ax-mp(wcel(crefld, crg), wcel(crefld, cfield))
  syl(wcel(crefld, cfield), wcel(crefld, crg), wcel(crefld, cidom))
  fldidom(crefld)
  sylbi(wcel(crefld, cidom), wcel(crefld, crg), wa(wcel(crefld, ccrg), wcel(crefld, cdomn)))
  isidom(crefld)
  adantr(wcel(crefld, ccrg), wcel(crefld, cdomn), wcel(crefld, crg))
  crngring(crefld)
  rlmlmod(crefld)
  eqtr3i(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, crefld)), co(ccnfld, cress, cr), crefld)
  ax-mp(wceq(crefld, cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, crefld))), wcel(crefld, cfield))
  refld()
  rlmsca(crefld, cfield)
  df-refld()
  simpli(wcel(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(crefld, cdr))
  isclmi(cfv(crglmod, crefld), cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, crefld)), cr)
  eqid(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, crefld)))
  ax-mp(wcel(cfv(crglmod, crefld), clvec), wcel(crefld, cdr))
  simpri(wcel(crefld, cdr), wcel(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  resubdrg()
  rlmlvec(crefld)
  df-cvs()
}

  ax-mp(wcel(cfv(crglmod, co(ccnfld, cress, cq)), clmod), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, cq), crg))

  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, co(ccnfld, cress, cq))), co(ccnfld, cress, cq)), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, cq), cdr))
  eqcomd(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, co(ccnfld, cress, cq))), co(ccnfld, cress, cq), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, cq), cdr))
  rlmsca(co(ccnfld, cress, cq), cdr)

thm zclmncvs(class c0) {

  ax-mp(wceq(zring, cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, zring))), wcel(zring, crg))
  df-zring()
  zsubrg()
  isclmi(cfv(crglmod, zring), cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, zring)), cz)
  eleq1i(c0, cclm, cfv(crglmod, zring))
  mpbir(wnel(c0, ccvs), wo(wn(wcel(cfv(crglmod, zring), cclm)), wn(wcel(cfv(crglmod, zring), clvec))))
  olci(wn(wcel(cfv(crglmod, zring), cclm)), wn(wcel(cfv(crglmod, zring), clvec)))
  mtbir(wcel(cfv(crglmod, zring), clvec), wa(wcel(cfv(crglmod, zring), clmod), wcel(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, zring)), cdr)))
  intnan(wcel(cfv(crglmod, zring), clmod), wcel(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, zring)), cdr))
  mtbir(wcel(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, zring)), cdr), wcel(zring, cdr))
  neli(zring, cdr)
  zringndrg()
  eleq1i(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, zring)), cdr, zring)
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, zring)), zring), wcel(zring, crg))
  zringring()
  eqcomd(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, zring)), zring, wcel(zring, crg))
  rlmsca(zring, crg)
  islvec(cfv(crglmod, zring), cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, zring)))
  eqid(cfv(csca, cfv(crglmod, zring)))
  bitri(wnel(c0, ccvs), wo(wn(wcel(cfv(crglmod, zring), cclm)), wn(wcel(cfv(crglmod, zring), clvec))), wn(wcel(c0, ccvs)))
  df-nel(c0, ccvs)
  xchnxbir(wcel(c0, ccvs), wo(wn(wcel(cfv(crglmod, zring), cclm)), wn(wcel(cfv(crglmod, zring), clvec))), wcel(cfv(crglmod, zring), cin(cclm, clvec)))
  xchnxbir(wcel(cfv(crglmod, zring), cin(cclm, clvec)), wo(wn(wcel(cfv(crglmod, zring), cclm)), wn(wcel(cfv(crglmod, zring), clvec))), wa(wcel(cfv(crglmod, zring), cclm), wcel(cfv(crglmod, zring), clvec)))
  ianor(wcel(cfv(crglmod, zring), cclm), wcel(cfv(crglmod, zring), clvec))
  elin(cfv(crglmod, zring), cclm, clvec)
  eleq12i(c0, ccvs, cfv(crglmod, zring), cin(cclm, clvec))
